note: Recovering Computer Science instructor, current Library Science grad student. Interested in legal and ethical aspects of technology, CS education, archives & preservation, information management, and all things iPad. "Star Trek" aficionado and cat lover. Still atoning for way too many sins from my prior life. He/him/his.

fields.name: Favorite “Star Trek” series
fields.value: DS9 (although I also stan Enterprise & SNW)
